marytts.unitselection.select.viterbi
Class ViterbiCandidate

java.lang.Object
  marytts.unitselection.select.viterbi.ViterbiCandidate
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<ViterbiCandidate>
public class ViterbiCandidate
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<ViterbiCandidate>

Represents a candidate for the Viterbi algorthm. Each candidate knows about its next candidate, i.e. they can form a queue.

Constructor Summary
ViterbiCandidate(Target target, Unit unit, TargetCostFunction tcf)

 int compareTo(ViterbiCandidate o)

setBestPath

public void setBestPath(ViterbiPath bestPath)
Sets the currently best path leading to this candidate. Each path leads to exactly one candidate; in the candidate, we only remember the best path leading to it.

Parameters:
bestPath -
